content.1: And Miriam and Aaron spake against Moses because of the Ethiopian woman whom he had married: for he had married an Ethiopian woman.
content.6: And he said, Hear now my words: If there be a prophet among you,
content.8: With him will I speak mouth to mouth, even apparently, and not in dark speeches; and the similitude of the
content.10: And the cloud departed from off the tabernacle; and, behold, Miriam
content.11: And Aaron said unto Moses, Alas, my lord, I beseech thee, lay not the sin upon us, wherein we have done foolishly, and wherein we have sinned.
content.12: Let her not be as one dead, of whom the flesh is half consumed when he cometh out of his mother’s womb.
content.15: And Miriam was shut out from the camp seven days: and the people journeyed not till Miriam was brought in
content.16: And afterward the people removed from Hazeroth, and pitched in the wilderness of Paran.
